name: Survival of The Fittest (mikhaelmingk)
description:
Survival of The Fittest

Created by: Mikhael Ming Khosasih

Survival of The Fittest is survival game. The story of this game is a young man who is going on a plane. Then the plane he was traveling on caught fire causing him to crash. This young man must be able to survive on a island. The goal of this game is to be able to return to your place of origin by making an SOS sign so that someone can pick you up and build a ship to sail to the nearest island. Players must be able to collect various equipment such as bags, drinking bottles for drinking, various types of food so they don't go hungry, to collect wood to make SOS signs and ships. In this game there are also enemies in the form of forest bears and eagles who are ready to prey on players. So players must be able to survive from hunger, thirst, and attacks by wild animals.
